                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if the previous block is an instance of IFreeBlock.
        Parameters:
        disk - the disk on which the block is stored
        position - the position of the current block
        Returns:

      • getBlockPosition

        public long getBlockPosition()
        Returns the position (address) of the block inside the virtual disk. Address 0 would be the first byte inside the virtual disk.
        Specified by:
        getBlockPosition in interface IVirtualBlock
        Returns:
        the address of the block

      • getDiskSize

        public long getDiskSize()
        Returns the size in bytes of the block on the disk.
        Specified by:
        getDiskSize in interface IVirtualBlock
        Returns:
        the size in bytes of the whole block on the virtual disk.
